full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO SUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE DRAG PO GSUM SGRIL GYI SGRUB THABS RDO RJE PHA LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AOR DU SU PI'I LE DON GRUB RGYA MTSO'I BLA MAR 'GRO MI SMAD RGYUD RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS 'BYOR GYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BA DANG, DON GNYER CAN GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN BSAM NAS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
